New Records: Sadeera Samarawickrama hit his maiden World Cup hundred
Kusal Mendis scored Sri Lanka's fastest-ever hundred in men's World Cup history
Key Match Events: Sadeera Samarawickrama shared a century stand with Kusal Mendis
Sadeera Samarawickrama shared a 50-plus stand with Dhananjaya de Silva
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pakistani bowlers seemed bereft of ideas while bowling to Samarawickrama
Samarawickrama's hundred came in the 46th over
The Sri Lankans had reached 200 before the 30-over mark
Others: Kusal Mendis smashed the Pakistani attack all over the Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium
Samarawickrama's knock included 10 excruciatingly beautiful boundaries and two towering sixes
